content:
Set up and configure Service Catalog actions to resolve customer contact reasons with Einstein Copilot.

REQUIRED EDITIONS AND USER PERMISSIONS
Available in: Lightning Experience
Available in: Enterprise, Performance, and Unlimited Editions with the Einstein for Service and Customer Service Catalog add-on licenses.

USER PERMISSIONS NEEDED
To create a Service Catalog Action in Einstein Copilot: 

Service Catalog Builder permission set

AND

Einstein Copilot for Salesforce Admin permission set

AND

Prompt Template Manager permission set

Complete general Einstein Copilot Setup.
Make sure you understand How Service Catalog Works in Einstein Copilot (Beta).

Access: Standard Service Catalog actions are available only when you have Service Catalog enabled with the proper licensing and permissions.

Standard Catalog Actions Setup:
The Service Catalog actions aren't included in the Einstein Copilot Actions page. To access, install sample catalog items, launch guided setup, and select Service Catalog Item as Reference Action Type.

Custom Catalog Actions Setup: Published catalog items are populated in Reference Action field of the guided setup. Choose which items to create actions for.

Set Up Standard Service Catalog Actions:

1. From Setup, enter Einstein Copilot Actions.
2. Click +New Copilot Action.
3. Select Service Catalog Item as Reference Action Type.
4. Select one of these catalog actions: Update Email, Update Phone Number, Open a Support Case.
5. Assign the action to your copilot.

Set Up Custom Service Catalog Actions:

1. From Setup, turn on Catalog Item Sharing in the Catalog Settings page.
2. Choose an Experience Cloud site or custom site to enable item sharing.
3. Review Best Practices for Einstein Copilot Action Instructions.
4. Create a Custom Copilot Action.
title: Configuring Service Catalog Actions in Einstein Copilot
